title: AI pushes Indian IT firms towards smaller, phased technology deals
description: Executives across companies linked the trend to how artificial intelligence (AI) projects are being adopted
content:
Indian IT companies are seeing a clear change in how global clients are buying technology services in FY26, with large transformation contracts increasingly being split into smaller, faster-to-execute deals.
Executives across companies linked the tre... [2917 chars]

title: Dying social media app replaces 15% of workers with AI in devastating mass layoffs
description: The company plans to cut less than 15 percent of its workforce - roughly 700 jobs - as it reshapes the company and puts more money into artificial intelligence.
content:
Pinterest plans to cut less than 15 percent of its workforce - roughly 700 jobs - as it reshapes the company and puts more money into artificial intelligence.
In a filing Tuesday, the San Francisco-based company said the layoffs are part of a broader... [1459 chars]

title: Pinterest shares plunge 10% as move to cut hundreds of jobs shocks investors
description: Pinterest will trim less than 15% of its workforce, the social media platform said Tuesday, as it plans to reallocate resources to its artificial intelligence-focused roles and strategy.
content:
Pinterest will trim less than 15% of its workforce, the social media platform said Tuesday, as it plans to reallocate resources to its artificial intelligence-focused roles and strategy.
Shares of the company, however, tumbled nearly 10% after its AI... [1577 chars]

title: Pinterest will lay off 15% of its workforce in pivot to AI
description: Pinterest plans to lay off under 15% of its workforce, as part of broader restructuring that arrives as the image-sharing platform pivots more of its money to artificial intelligence.
content:
NEW YORK (AP) — Pinterest plans to lay off under 15% of its workforce, as part of broader restructuring that arrives as the image-sharing platform pivots more of its money to artificial intelligence.
